name: Crown of the Saints
title: Testimony of Tribal Kings: Crown of the Saints
desc: "Under the sun's radiance did the tribes make a pact of armistice, and thus did the sacred ones of the night realm lay their arguments aside and offer him the crown."
in_play_description:
After the character to which this is attached consumes Nightsoul points: The character's next Skill or Technique deals +1 DMG. (Twice per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)

skills.desc:
After the character to which this is attached consumes Nightsoul points: The character's next Skill or Technique deals +1 DMG. (Twice per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
